Description: Fragment of pottery amphora; echinus-shaped ring foot and small part of body; black glaze on outside of foot, added red stripe at lower edge; red dipinto on base. Hard, light brown/reddish clay, Munsell 2.5YR 6/4 (light reddish brown).
Bibliographic references: Weber 2012 / Untersuchungen zur archaischen griechischen Keramik aus anderen ägyptischen Fundorten (TD 334)
Petrie 1888 / Tanis. Part II. Nebesheh (Am) and Defenneh (Tahpanhes) (pl. xxxii, right, top)
Leclère and Spencer 2014 / Tell Dafana Reconsidered: The Archaeology of an Egyptian Frontier Town (p.129)
Acquisition notes: Found unregistered in the Department in 2010, in a box with other sherds from Tell Dafana.
